tracks.text: In a room, a man sits facing away from us. Michael Stipe, the vocalist, has short brown hair, black pants, and a white shirt. He sits in front of a window, where a full pitcher sits.
On the right, another man, guitarist Mike Mills, stands in white pants, a white shirt, and a black vest. He looks at us, then walks to the left, off camera.
Guitarist Peter Buck and drummer Bill Berry run by, looking up.
The pitcher falls and shatters, spilling milk across the floor.
Montage of band members sitting in different places around the dim room, while Mills picks a small guitar.
Briefly, Stipe stands in front of wings. Stipe sits, crossed-arms, facing away from the spilled milk, while Berry rests hands on Stipe's shoulders, looking distant.
Alone, Berry spreads his arms wide
Stipe stands in front of a wings.
Stipe paces and fidgets around the empty room.

A bald black man sits, crouched, in a chair, dressed like a Renaissance painting cherub. Behind him is a picture of cloudy blue sky over the ocean. Around him is a wooden frame decorated with golden apples, necklaces, netting, christmas ornaments, doll body parts, and disembodied baby heads on top of sticks that resemble spines. A spotlight runs over the cherub's face, and he turns to us.
2 men in military uniforms look at us, then turn away, as a spotlight turns towards the camera.
A pre-pubescent boy stands, against his tree, his hands tied above him by vines. 2 black arros are taped to his chest. A spotlight blinds him, and he turns away.
A spotlight runs over 2 people with shoulder length hair and ornate dress. One is covered in bronze and jewels, the other has a pink headress. They are framed by vines wrapped in gauze.
A man in a military uniform looks at a red flag. Other men stand in front of an armillary sphere, a metal device made of several concentric spheres.
A man stands in the spotlight. He has short brown hair, red pants, beaded necklaces, toned muscles, and no shirt.
Stipe, now on the floor, sings. The armillary sphere casts a shadow on the yellow wall behind him.
2 men stand around a donkey, look up, and hold their poses. Behind them, a woman points up. Sun streams through a window,
The cherub bounces slightly. His wings move, as if flapping.
Stipe sings alone. Military men look around. Stipe sits on the floor next to a polished tree stump. Band members stand nearby.
An old man sits under a tree. He has feathery white wings and a yellow tunic. The cherub sits behind him.
The military men moves the spotlight. The cherub covers his eyes, and the old man rolls to his right.
In a dusty barn, a woman points up. A figure with giant wings crashes to the floor. A bearded man reaches down to the angel, sprawled on the floor, amidst a cloud of dust.
The cherub looks down where the man rolled away. On the floor, the bearded man and the fallen angel looks up at the cherub's outstretched hand, far out of reach.
The fallen angel stands and looks away. The bearded man gestures vigorously, while talking to someone off screen.
The shirtless man from earlier wears a yellow Hawaiian lei. He looks away as the spotlight shines in his face.
Stipe stands in front of wings. He falls to his knees. Behind him, a book sits between the wings.
An ornately dressed woman in bronze and jewels turns. Fire burns in the foreground. She has a powder white face and purple eyeshadow.
Three people in white gather around the old, winged angel. One carries a crutch. To the left, a woman reaches up, looking at the sky.
Stipe dances and claps alone. By the angel, the bearded man laughs. Mills stands by a wall, and watches Stipe dance.
A woman in mechanics clothes holds up old fashioned style blue prints. Behind her, sparks fly from a machine. A close up of the blue prints reveals a design for wings.
Montage of Stipe dancing, branches with sparse leaves, fluttering grass, and a crown of spikes.
The prepubescent boy crouches in a grassy field. He arches his back, as if in pain from the back arrows taped to his torso.
Mechanics build metal frames in the shape of wings, against a red backdrop. 2 military men position a spotlight, also in front of a red backdrop.
The old angel stands, as a woman in white prepares to throw something. Band members watch Stipe dance. The spotlight flashes the woman in the ornate pink headress.
Gathered around the old angel, other people hold ropes. The shirtless man flinches from the spotlight. The prepubescent boy poses in the grass, as the sky behind him darkens.
Hammers strike an anvil, and sparks fly.
The pitcher of milk falls. Stipe crouches in a chair, facing away from us, as the spilled milk covers the floor.
The cherub, the shirtless man, the prepubescent boy, and the ornately dreseed women pose together in the grass. Feathers fall from the sky.
Military mechanics stand for a portrait in front of mechanical wings. The red backdrop flutters in the breeze.
The bearded man and several others gather in the barn, lifting the old angel off of the floor, where he has just fallen. They hold their pose.
Stipe sits, looking away from us. Behind him sits a book, with angel wings spread to either side. The other band members stand behind the wings, facing away, cast in shadow.
Fade to black
Text appears. Copyright 1991 R.E.M. / Athens Limited
